user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: The screenshot displays an Amazon search result page for "MacBook Air." The user is filtering by RAM size with options for 4GB, 6GB, and 8GB. The results show several MacBook Air models, including the 2020 Apple M1 version priced at $967.50, along with product ratings and availability details. The page also indicates that items are climate pledge-friendly and ships to the Netherlands.

click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
